Created an attachment (id=429)
feature+site less the plugins

To reproduce. After expanding the attached tstsite.zip
1) Open the Install/Update perspective
2) Switch to update sites (expand My Computer)
3) Find the site expand it.
4) Expand "Other"
5 ) error occurs giving the trace provided

Error parsing site stream. The 'url' tag of the element 'Description / Site' is 
null or empty. Value is required.


but we sill get a NPE in the UI.
